programme.desc: A look at some of the most thrilling acts from Echo, Alegria, and Bazzar; enjoy the view of the high-flying Teeterboard, hair-raising Slack Line, action-packed Aerialist, and much more.

programme.title: Cirque Redux
programme.desc: Journey through the captivating spectacle that has enraptured audiences worldwide; from its dazzling acrobatics to its poignant storytelling, Alegria embodies the essence of its name, spreading joy wherever it goes.

programme.title: Crystal & Axel
programme.desc: Enjoy some of the best live show moments of Crystal and Axel, the very first on ice productions from Cirque du Soleil.

programme.desc: These artists find, and keep, their balance in this hour-long special.

programme.title: O - Flow
programme.desc: A look at the best live show moments of "O"; the performers share their experience and emotions at that quintessential moment of an act.

programme.title: Best Of
programme.desc: A group spectacular; showcasing the Best of Group Acts III, featuring beautiful performances from Crystal's frozen playground, the powertrack in Alegria, and so much more.

programme.title: Best Of
programme.desc: Some of the most mesmerizing makeup looks; from the vibrant hues of Amaluna to the otherworldly allure of Ka, witness the artistry and creativity that bring performances to life.

programme.desc: Relive the most intense performances from O, Alegria and Bazzar.

programme.title: Amaluna

programme.title: Best Of
programme.desc: A spectacular performance of Cirque's show Echo, combining poetry, stagecraft, daring acrobatics, and technology to explore the delicate balance between people, animals, and the world.

programme.title: Best Of
programme.desc: Flick, frame, glissage, hip twist, lockstep, lunge and step; getting moves on for a tour of some of Cirque du Soleil's best dance moments.

programme.desc: Experience the poetic and mischievous world of Corteo, with incredible performances.

programme.title: Cirque Du Soleil: Spotlight On
programme.desc: Step inside BAZZAR - an eclectic performance lab of infinite creativity and uplifting beauty! This Spotlight On captures the spirit of this show: high-energy excitement and collision of sounds and colours, that you'd find at a traditional 'bazaar!
